interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: JulyQueen Jumbo Braiding Hair Synthetic High Temperature Fiber African Twist Two Tone Ombre Color Braids (2-41 3pack)
Review Date: 2020/12/30
Store: JulyQueen
Average Rating: 2.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'JulyQueen', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Extension Length': '24 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '12.52 x 9.76 x 3.11 inches; 11.82 Ounces', 'UPC': '778957703700'}
Review Text: Got tangled easily. The blue is super dull. I expected it to be brighter like the photo. You get a lot though so I guess that's a plus. Also has a very stringy feeling to it and had an odd packaging smell.
Review Title: Blue is dull.
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara Black, Natural Waterproof Mascara Extra Long Lash,Thick Thickening and Lengthening, No Clumping, No Smudging, Lasting Voluminous Eyelashes Dramatic Extension Mascara
SIKEMAY
{'Color': 'Black', 'Special Feature': 'Smudge Proof, Non Clumping', 'Brand': 'SIKEMAY', 'Specialty': 'Waterproof, Hypoallergenic', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '8.9 x 4 x 1.1 inches; 2.57 Ounces', 'UPC': '764690676852', 'Manufacturer': 'SIKEMAY'}
I really wanted to like this. Unlike most fiber mascaras this didnt give me much volume or length. And it flaked off after a full day of wear. I really love the packaging. I think this may be ok on fake lashes but not so great on real or short lashes.
Not a true fiber mascara.
Poly Nail Gel Kit, 7 Colors Nail Extension Gel with UV Lamp, Poly Extension Decoration Kit, Base Top Coat Set with Rhinestone, Nail Molds, Nail Art Gel Kits for Home DIY Manicure, Blue Nude Series
AIFAIFA
{'Color': 'Blue', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'AIFAIFA', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Product Dimensions': '5.9 x 5.9 x 5.9 inches; 1.48 Pounds'}
I like that it comes in a case. The colors are vibrant. No strong smell. Only thing that disappointed me was the light. I had to do one finger at a time, flip it twice under it's own time in order to get fully dry. The light did not extend to all my fingers without some odd maneuvering.
Nice except the light.
Mini Rubber Bands Soft Elastic Bands for Kids Hair Non-slip Rubber Hair Bands Soft Hair Elastics Ties Bands Braids Hair for Girls - STRONG - REUSEABLE (Colorful1000+Black1000)
OLEWELL
{'Material': 'Rubber', 'Item Form': 'Elastic', 'Brand': 'OLEWELL', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Number of Pieces': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 5 x 1 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SML'}
Have quite a bit of stretch. They didnt slip down the hair and they seem pretty strong. Love the multicolored ones, they were great to add color to different styles.
Bigger than most but work great
20pcs Nail Tips Clips for Quick Building Polygel Nail Forms Nail Tips Clip for Finger Nail Extension DIY Manicure Nail Art Tool
tiggell
{'Size': '20 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Brand': 'Tiggell', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Package Dimensions': '8.98 x 6.85 x 2.2 inches; 4.16 Ounces', 'UPC': '795853588163'}
Did their job! Fit the finger well, did not pinch and weren't overly tight. Had just enough squeeze to it to hold the form on so instead of doing one at a time you can do multiple. Had no issues curing through the clip. I also used it to pinch the end of an acrylic nail as well and it worked nicely for the as well.
Doesnt hinder curing
Beard Brush, Comb, Scissors Grooming Kit for Men's Care, Perfect to Distribute Balm or Oil for Growth & Styling, Adds Shine & Softness Black Color
GROW ALPHA BEARD
{'Package Dimensions': '7.4 x 3.4 x 2.3 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '300875400470 719279662702'}
The brush is really nice. Did a great job at smoothing the hairs especially nearly the cheekbones. The comb was great for the chin and under areas to reach the thicker hairs. The brush has a good weight to it and is pretty thick! I did feel like, if the comb were to go through a bad enough tangle, it may cause damage. Works best with a little oil too!
Loved the brush weight
Pine Gel Nail Polish Set Chameleon Shimmering Color and Black 7.5 ml LED UV Cured Soak Off Nail Gel for Nail Art Manicure
pine
{'Brand': 'Pine', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Liquid Volume': '0.25 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '4.96 x 3.7 x 2.91 inches; 9.14 Ounces', 'UPC': '738628890993'}
These sparkles work best with the black as a base. The black is pretty opaque. best if used with 2 coats but ok if used with one. The polish itself was easy to spread. However, I noticed a couple of the glitters were a little runnier than the others. The sparkle polish was very vibrant. Havent had a chip all week. Cured fairly well.
Sparkles are very nice
6 Pack Portable travel bottles-30ml Flip Cap Reusable Bottles Keychain Carriers for Shampoo,Hand Sanitizer Refillable Keychain Sanitizer Holder -1oz dispenser bottle, Metal 6 Pack Buckle Include
SKYCY
{'Package Dimensions': '7.99 x 5.16 x 2.2 inches; 7.13 Ounces', 'UPC': '653552483144'}
My family really loved these! They're refillable and they hold a lot more sanitizer than I thought. The colors are vibrant and clear. The clip is sturdy and the bottles seem durable. You get a nice variety as well. I like that the caps are faced upwards instead of down like the ones at the store which means no leaking product. Works with (thinner) lotions too!
Pretty and functional
CONBOLA Make Up Organizer 5 in 1 Dresser Organizer,Portable for Lipstick and Jewlry ,Makeup Organizer and Temporary Makeup Brush Holder,Multi-purpose for Girl Women.36.6cm18cm.(Blue)
CONBOLA
{'Material': 'Silicone', 'Special Feature': 'Portable', 'Color': 'Blue', 'Brand': 'CONBOLA', 'Mounting Type': 'Tabletop Mount', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Package Type': 'Standard Packaging', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '15.08 x 7.44 x 1.5 inches; 1.65 Pounds', 'UPC': '750226660013'}
The mirror came with fingerprints and smudges on it. Looked as though it had been shoved into the box. Theres no directions or suggestions for setup in the box. Things were easy to remove and move around to customize. I just wish I hadn't have had to sit and scrub the mirror to get the prints off. They've obviously been there for a while. It prompted me to also sanitized every piece a little extra just in case.
Came smudged with prints
Jumbo Braiding Hair Extensions 24 Inch Ombre Synthetic Hair Crochet Braids Kanekalon Long Jumbo Braids For Box Twist Crochet Hair (Orange/Yellow/Blue/Purple)
Belle Show
{'Brand': 'Belle Show', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Extension Length': '24 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '11.3 x 10.2 x 4.8 inches; 1.41 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'Bailishow'}
Super pretty. Very vibrant. You get a ton of wefts for the price. I usually keep a single braid in my hair as a memorial, I loved the option of adding color. My daughter has thick blonde hair and this looked great on hers too, to spice up a day of wear. The only downside I had with this hair is how easily it tangled at the bottom as I braided it. It came with little colorful add ins and a hook.
So pretty but tangled easy.
BELLA MODA Sponges Blender Puff for Powder, Liquid and Cream Makeup 4PCS Purple Beauty Blending Sponge Foundations Powders Wet and Dry Used
BELLA MODA
{'Brand': 'BELLA MODA', 'Color': 'Purple', 'Material': 'Sponge', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Face Makeup', 'Package Dimensions': '5.8 x 2.9 x 2.9 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '823544676230'}
Purple is my favorite color and these were so pretty. I definitely preferred to use them wet. Dry was a little rough. I liked having a multitude of these to switch between cream liquid colors. Was also nice to have the option to put a couple aside to wash and still having a couple left. I love the little container. Was nicely packaged. I didnt have any chemical smell with mine.
Purple!
Biutee Nail Stamping Plates 5pcs Templates With Stamper Scraper Set Nail Art Plates set animal flower Christmas halloween design
Biutee
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.42 x 5.75 x 1.18 inches; 5.47 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'TOOL-AT-755', 'Manufacturer': 'Biutee'}
Nicely, and deeply etched. Loved the french prints most. You get a lot of holiday inspired choices. Easy enough to clean. I did buff my stamper to get a better stick. Overall, works well.
Nicely etched.
JulyQueen Jumbo Braiding Hair Synthetic High Temperature Fiber African Twist Two Tone Ombre Color Braids (2-41 3pack)
JulyQueen
{'Brand': 'JulyQueen', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Extension Length': '24 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '12.52 x 9.76 x 3.11 inches; 11.82 Ounces', 'UPC': '778957703700'}
Got tangled easily. The blue is super dull. I expected it to be brighter like the photo. You get a lot though so I guess that's a plus. Also has a very stringy feeling to it and had an odd packaging smell.
Blue is dull.
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user maintains a strong attraction to vibrant cosmetics and grooming tools, with an expanding interest in nail art supplies and now hair extensions. They value products that allow for creative expression and versatility in grooming styles.

- **Quality Expectations:** High standards for product performance and hygiene are paramount for the user. Recent experiences have reinforced their expectation for items that not only function effectively but are also easy to clean. Their critical insight into product attributes emphasizes usability and satisfaction.

- **Packaging Appreciation:** The user continues to prioritize aesthetically pleasing and functional packaging, which influences purchasing decisions. They express satisfaction for products that offer a range of designs and themes, particularly vibrant options, although recent experiences have highlighted some concerns about unpleasant packaging odors.

- **Critical Insight:** Their reviews are constructive and detailed, focusing on specific elements such as product effectiveness and overall quality. They show a commitment to enhancing user experiences by sharing honest insights about their encounters with various beauty products.

- **Product Engagement:** Engaging with colorful and well-constructed items that meet their grooming and artistic needs remains a priority. They appreciate tools that facilitate a range of styles while maintaining cleanliness, although recent interactions have uncovered frustrations regarding color vibrancy and product texture.

Overall, the user values quality, functionality, aesthetics, and user experience, sharing detailed insights that reflect their evolving preferences while remaining mindful of product performance.
